DataListSpec.Name: Sustained Giving Top 10 Donors
DataListSpec.Description: A data list showing sustained giving records.
DataListSpec.Author: Blackbaud Product Development

SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure BBDW.USR_USP_DATALIST_SUSTAINEDGIVING_TOPDONORS ( @STARTDATE datetime = null, @ENDDATE datetime = null ) as set nocount on;
select top 10 c.[CONSTITUENTSYSTEMID] as [ID], c.[FULLNAME], sum(ip.[RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTPAYMENTAMOUNT]) as [TOTALREVENUE] from BBDW.[FACT_RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTPAYMENT] ip inner join BBDW.[FACT_FINANCIALTRANSACTION] ft on ip.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONFACTID] = ft.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONFACTID] left join BBDW.[DIM_CONSTITUENT] c on ft.[CONSTITUENTDIMID] = c.[CONSTITUENTDIMID] where (@STARTDATE is null or ft.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONDATE] > @STARTDATE) and (@ENDDATE is null or ft.[FINANCIALTRANSACTIONDATE] < @ENDDATE) group by c.[CONSTITUENTSYSTEMID], c.[FULLNAME] order by sum(ip.[RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTPAYMENTAMOUNT]) desc
